unlockable.PreReqNeeded.Description.translation: You need to unlock the {0} {1} first!

unlockable.BitsRequired.EarnMore.translation: Earn more by completing Daily Goals

unlockable.FistBump.Description.translation: Want to show Cozmo that you're proud of him? Give him a little fist bump! With this upgrade, Cozmo will hold his lift in the air and wait for you to bump it.

unlockable.FistBump.SparkButtonDescripti.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to fist bump

unlockable.FistBump.SparkedStateDescript.translation: When he's ready, fist bump Cozmo

unlockable.PeekABoo.Description.translation: Peekaboo, I see you! With this Upgrade, play Peekaboo with Cozmo by hiding your face behind your hands, then show your face again to surprise him.

unlockable.PeekABoo.SparkButtonDescripti.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to play Peekaboo

unlockable.PeekABoo.SparkedStateDescript.translation: First hide your face, then Peekaboo!

unlockable.Workout.Description.translation: Even robots need exercise! With this upgrade, Cozmo learns to workout with a Cube to stay in top shape.

unlockable.Workout.SparkButtonDescriptio.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to workout

unlockable.Workout.SparkedStateDescripti.translation: Watch Cozmo find a Cube and workout

unlockable.CubePounce.Description.translation: With this Upgrade, Cozmo learns how to play Keepaway, a game of reflexes and reaction time.

unlockable.FaceEnrollment.Description.translation:
With this Upgrade, Cozmo learns to remember faces and speak names.

Find this in the Meet Cozmo activity.

unlockable.MemoryMatch.Description.translation: With this Upgrade, Cozmo learns how to play the Memory Match game.

unlockable.SpeedTap.Description.translation: With this Upgrade, Cozmo learns how to play the game Quick Tap. Over time, his skills will improve!

unlockable.CubeRollAction.Description.translation: Cozmo prefers Cubes to be right side up. This Upgrade allows him to roll Cubes, especially when they are on their side.

unlockable.CubeRollAction.SparkButtonDes.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to roll a Cube

unlockable.CubeRollAction.SparkedStateDe.translation: Watch Cozmo roll the first Cube he sees

unlockable.DroneMode.Description.translation: With this Upgrade, Cozmo will allow you to pilot him in Explorer Mode.

unlockable.CubeStackAction.Description.translation: With this Upgrade, Cozmo gains the ability to create a stack of two Power Cubes.

unlockable.CubeStackAction.SparkedStateD.translation: Watch Cozmo create a stack of Cubes

unlockable.CubeStackAction.SparkButtonDe.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to stack two Cubes

unlockable.PounceOnMotionAction.Descript.translation: With this Upgrade, when Cozmo sees movement on the ground in front of him, such as a finger, he will playfully pounce on it!

unlockable.PounceOnMotionAction.SparkBut.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to pounce on fingers

unlockable.PounceOnMotionAction.SparkedS.translation: Cozmo will pounce on any movement he sees

unlockable.BuildPyramid.Description.translation: With this Upgrade, Cozmo gains the ability to build a pyramid out of three upright Cubes.

unlockable.BuildPyramid.SparkButtonDescr.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to build a pyramid

unlockable.BuildPyramid.SparkedStateDesc.translation: Watch Cozmo build a pyramid out of 3 Cubes

unlockable.PopAWheelieAction.Description.translation: Cozmo gains a new trick! With this Upgrade he can use a Cube to boost himself up, and pop a wheelie.

unlockable.PopAWheelieAction.SparkButton.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to pop a wheelie

unlockable.PopAWheelieAction.SparkedStat.translation: Watch Cozmo pop a wheelie off a Cube

unlockable.KnockOverThreeCubeStack.Descr.translation: With this Upgrade, any time Cozmo sees a stack of Power Cubes, he may decide to knock them over.

unlockable.KnockOverThreeCubeStack.Spark.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to knock over a stack
Build a stack of Cubes for Cozmo to tip over

unlockable.PickupCube.Description.translation: With this Upgrade, Cozmo gains the ability to pick up Power Cubes and carry them around.

unlockable.PickupCube.SparkButtonDescrip.translation: Tap to ask Cozmo to pick up a Cube

unlockable.PickupCube.SparkedStateDescri.translation: Watch Cozmo pick up a Cube

unlockable.ComingSoon.Description.translation: Check back for more great Upgrades, Apps, and fun Cozmo features

unlockable.Unavailable.Description.translation: Unlock more upgrades before you can unlock {0}.

sparks.Spark.ConfirmQuit.Description.translation: If you leave before he is done, Cozmo will no longer be Sparked.

sparks.NotEnoughSparks.Desc.translation: Earn more by completing Daily Goals

sparks.CubesNeedUpright.Desc.translation: When the cubes are upright with their lights up, Cozmo can build more quickly.
